ygData.subject: Amperion's wanderings
ygData.msgSnippet: ... After the battle at the CF Amperion wandered off into the distance crossing Africa into Asia.  He headed more or less northeast for no apparent reason.

::Amperion::
    After the battle at the CF Amperion wandered off into the distance 
crossing Africa into Asia.  He headed more or less northeast for no apparent 
reason.
